content: हर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (रा --री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [हृ-अच्] {@--1@} Taking away, removing, depriving one of; as in खेदहर, शोकहर. {@--2@} Bringing, conveying, carrying, taking; अपथहराः <ls>Ki. 5. 50</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 51.</ls> {@--3@} Seizing, grasping. {@--4@} Attracting, captivating. {@--5@} Claiming, entitled to; as in रिक्थहर &c.; <ls>Mu. 2. 19.</ls> {@--6@} Occupying; <ls>Ku. 1. 50.</ls> {@--7@} Dividing. --रः {@--1@} Śiva; <ls>Ku. 1. 50</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">3. 40</ls>, <ls n="Ku. 3.">67</ls>, <ls>Me. 7.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Agni or fire. {@--3@} An ass. {@--4@} A divisor. {@--5@} The denominator of a fraction. {@--6@} The act of seizing, taking. {@--7@} A seizer, ravisher.
